item.title: Apple Expected to Win Rights to Formula 1 With $150m Bid
item.description: Apple is expected to win the rights to stream Formula 1 races on Apple TV+ in the United States thanks to a $150 million bid, Business Insider reports. The rights to broadcast Formula 1 in the Uni
